name: Fly Smart
about: Fly Smart Pilot Training, located at Kissimmee Gateway Airport in Orlando, Florida, offers affordable, safe, and passionate flight training. We provide one-on-one pilot training, ensuring each student receives personalized attention and instruction. Our experienced and knowledgeable instructors are dedicated to helping students achieve their aviation goals. With a focus on safety and professionalism, Fly Smart is committed to making flight training accessible and enjoyable for all. Whether you are a beginner or advancing your certifications, Fly Smart is the ideal choice for your aviation education. Join us to embark on your flying journey with confidence and excellence.
services:
["Biennial Flight Review
Ground School
Flight Instructor Instrument CFII
Private Pilot
Instrument"]
